head.title: Search in {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{EnvNameShort}}
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} is able to enrich {{ProgLang}} applications by efficient text searches in various business document formats.

header.title: Search for text in business documents
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides text search in your documents, by powerful and flexible queries. Add search ability to {{EnvNameShort}} applications.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdShortName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a mature library designed for efficient text search and documents indexing. We support over 70 file formats, including such industry standard docs as PDF, Word, Excel, Presentation, etc. Fast and accurate search might improve your solution.

more_features.title: Advanced searching features
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} implements sophisticated text search across more than 70 file formats. Index constructing increases efficiency of locating and managing document information.

feature_1.title: Advanced text search
feature_1.content: Get suitable text from business documents of popular types, including PDFs, Word, Presentations and spreadsheets. Many types of search like fuzzy search, homophone search, wildcards, etc. are supported.

feature_2.title: Building search index increase usability
feature_2.content: Build and reuse search indexes in order to increase efficiency. Indexing optimizes searches across extensive document collections.

feature_3.title: Frequently used languages support
feature_3.content: Searches in documents written on over 80 languages. Use different keyboard layouts and word variations to improve accuracy.

feature_4.title: Flexible search settings
feature_4.content: Reduce amount of result data by using various options, settings, filters, regular expressions.

formats.title: Find data in your business documents
formats.description: Supporting 70+ file formats {{ProdShortName}} enable processing of the most popular office documents.

examples.comment_1: Path for the reusable search index
examples.comment_3: Search only in documents with demanded format

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) provides efficient search for {{FileFormatUp}} documents, which could be used in {{EnvName}} apps.
content.step_1: Set up the folder to store the search index.
content.step_3: Provide search options to process only {{FileFormatUp}} documents.

code_1.title: Filter documents to be processed
code_1.content: Examine how to reduce number of processed docs by filters
